abstract: In southen Thailand, it's the teachers who are being killed - in their schools, during the day, in front of their students, with assault weapons. Muslim insurgents are now targeting Buddhist teachers like never before, and a new report by Human Rights Watch calls on the Thai government to provide better security in what is already a highly militarized area.

headline.main: Teachers Being Targeted and Murdered in Thailand
